item.title: All about Eventual and Strongly Consistency
item.description: Eventual Consistent Mainly used in NoSQL databases (Solr, Cassandra , MongoDb) Used for analytics , time series analysis , etc Low latency - Faster writes Please follow Werner Voggel’s blog - here Strongly Consistent Mainly used in RDBMS like Oracle , MySQL , PostgreSQL Primarily used in banking and payment systems High latency - Slower writes Please read about F1 database by Google here Photo Credits : Google Blog
